channel.title: Logged in a forum with both tor and vpn
channel.description:
Hello I always have logged in a forum(debian.org) with vpn(I have also noscript and duckduckgo) but unfortunately this time I had the need to log when I was in whonix. Now can anybody associate me to the use of Whonix/Tor?
Regards

item.title: Logged in a forum with both tor and vpn
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Yes, the moderators of the forum in question are able to see that you are using Tor by matching the IP of the exit node you used with a public list of exit nodes.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Logged in a forum with both tor and vpn
